calculation: Only calculated if Current Probability is Likely or Possible.  The Current Severity Level is a 1-12 scale, points are awarded based on responses to rls6 (0=not at all, 2=a little, 4=moderately, 6=extremely) and rls7 (1=less than 1/month...6=every day).  If answer to either of the questions is Donâ€™t Know then no score is provided.
